name: HUNTING SIMULATOR VR
description:
Experience the fun and excitement of Hunting Simulator within a Virtual Reality Environment.

  • Travel in an extraordinary and remarkable open world, specifically designed for the Virtual Reality experience.
  • Immerse yourself in lush environments filled with a variety of animal species.
  • Watch out for attacking predators.
  • Enjoy customization attachments for your rifle.
  • User interface and controls built exclusively for VR.[/list
